name: Ramada Coquitlam

reviews.text: The sign up in the fron desk area gave it all away "This property is owned and operated by Squire Inn" This is an older type hotel recently aquired by Ramada, but it is not what you would expect from a Ramada. Front desk was slow checking us in and the clerk was dressed in a sweatsuit! They told us the restaraunt would stay open for us, but the communication never got across to the restaraunt and they would not stay open. Members of our group were given the key to an already occupied room and walked in on complete strangers and 10pm!
reviews.title: Expect more from a Ramada

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The pool and hot tub were decent and the rooms were comfortable and clean.
reviews.title: Handy location - great staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I am not happy with Ramadas in general for aquiring these old hotels and using their name in order to charge more.
reviews.title: Excellent value - but could be quieter.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were walk ins for one night only and ended up staying for 3. They had a heavily reduced tariff for three nights and the rooms were very comfortable. 25 mins to the city via Sky train and the staff were very helpful.
reviews.title: verrrry questionable

reviews.text: Very convenient location in the outer suburbs of Vancouver - spotless room, friendly and helpful staff. They even upgraded us from a standard to a King. Restaurant was OK - but nothing to rave about. Not the quietest of nights - single glazed windows failed to keep out traffic noise. Soundproofing of rooms not too good, as there were people in adjacent rooms who could 'talk for Canada' until after 1am -- not good after a 7 hour drive, and being faced with a 9 hour flight the following day!
reviews.title: Never again

reviews.text: This is one hotel that we would suggest you miss!
reviews.title: Not this one!!

reviews.text: I booked a room to spend a couple of days at the Vancouver Olympics and really just needed a place to crash with my family. We didn’t need anything fancy, and were just looking to find a room at a reasonable price given the price inflation around the Olympics. So when I called the hotel, they said they “just had a couple of cancellations and thus a room available for $150,” I was delighted. Following our stay, it was clear that wasn’t the case. As you can see in the accompanying pictures the lot was empty at 8 AM when we checked out on Sunday, and the reasons were clear. While the rooms were clean, they were highly worn (see pictures) and ours smelled of smoke. They claim they are a 3 ½ star, but that is only possible if it is on a scale that goes to ten. I travel extensively for business and pleasure and on a normal scale, this would be a two start property at best. Furthermore, the representation of this hotel is very misleading:
reviews.title: Misleading and worn down

reviews.text: -While they call it a hotel, it should be called a motel as most of the rooms have outside entry doors from a parking lot overlooking a Midas muffler repair shop. (see pictures)
reviews.title: Typical Ramada - No Frills, Cheap

reviews.text: -While the hotel claims it is within “walking distance” to the light rail, it was a half mile walk along a dark 4 lane highway with barely a shoulder, let alone a sidewalk for most of the way.
reviews.title: Too dirty for me!

reviews.text: -What they don’t mention in the description is the sound of trains honking and clanking throughout the night.
reviews.title: An excellent experience for our entire group!

reviews.text: I would also point out that the phone in the room didn't work. I mentioned this to the front desk the right after we checked in and after two days, they still hadn't fixed it.
reviews.title: Old, Tired, and overpriced.

description: Ramada Coquitlam offers an extensive selection of cozy rooms for the individual, families and groups. A dedicated staff aimed at providing the highest level of quality service for your comfort. Relax in our indoor hot tub & heated swimming pool ~ Surf the Net with complimentary Wi-Fi ~ On-Site dining offering a wide array of menus ~ banquet & conference facilities.
